name: CPTravelEstimates
desc: An object that describes the time and distance remaining for a maneuver in a navigation session.

items.name: init(distanceRemaining: Measurement<UnitLength>, timeRemaining: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates travel estimates with remaining distance and time.

items.name: var distanceRemaining: Measurement<UnitLength>
items.desc: The remaining distance for the travel estimate.

items.name: var timeRemaining: TimeInterval
items.desc: The remaining time for the travel estimate.
